|chip1 = Realtek;RTL8812BU; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 2 |rxchains = 2 |sstreams = 2 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 867 |nqam = 400 |802.11n = 300/300 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/01/2019 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |price = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B07RXTVK7J |asin_country = CA |asin2 = B07YYL3RYJ |asin_country2 = CA |country = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "1246-00000172-50Z", "BP4M", "E186014", "P/C*F119-223", and "EW-7822UNC" are silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
{{See also|Netgear A6150}}
==Pictures== <center>'''Retail Images''' <gallery> File:DWA-181 Front.png| File:DWA-181 Side1.png| File:DWA-181 Side2.png| </gallery></center>[[Has images::retail| ]][[Has images::external| ]]
==Notes== ===Linux support=== For linux kernel version 2.6.24 ~ 5.8 (Realtek), 5.9 (Nov,2020)
USB using the chip Realtek RTL8812BU
Easy to follow installation: https://github.com/morrownr/88x2bu
Change network setting to wpa2 connection if usb is not wpa3 supported
[[Category:English Documentation]]
